Why Cellgevity

Cellgevity boosts the Immune System. It makes you live a longer and healthier life. It improves mental clarity and focus. It increases the body's energy levels. It helps promote optimal levels of Glutathione. Learn more

Impact of Oxidative Stress on Female Fertility

Oxidative Stress(OS) can affect EVERY process involved in reproduction in females.

It negatively affects the quality/maturity of the eggs. It can weaken the wall of the uterus. It can affect implantation of the fertilized egg. It can be a cause of IVF failure. It can increase the incidence of miscarriages. Causes ovulation disorders such as ovarian cysts. Increases the risk of pregnancy complications.

Impact of Oxidative Stress on Male Infertility

Research has shown. 30-40% of male infertility is caused by OS. OS can cause a decrease in the hormones that are responsible for sperm production (low sperm count) and appearance (immature/abnormal sperm) OS can also damage the sperm, rendering them dormant/inactive. The sperm loses it's ability to swim to the egg in the woman (poor sperm quality). Thus the sperm lacks fertilization potential.

Little Interesting Story From Our User

From a Cellgevity user, I got married 2010 and in 2011 I was diagnosed with multiple fibroids. I was really afraid of surgery because people advised me against it. I have used so many supplements both made at home and abroad and none worked, that was the reason I didn't buy the idea of cellgevity when my friend told me about it. I did fibroid surgery in 2017, immediately after that I started praying to conceive, then in one of my praying sessions I heard a voice that said to me ''Try Cellgevity'' so immediately after the prayer I started reading more about cellgevity and after which I decided that I am going to give it a trial. God directed me to this Angel Mrs. Nkiruka Ezima who bought and sent cellgevity to me. I started taking cellgevity on 16th December while I was on my monthly cycle, and was confirmed pregnant on 15th of January this year after both private and NHS hospitals in UK told me that I can only conceive through IVF. Today I have a bouncing baby boy to call mine, what a mighty God we serve. #CellgevityWorks
